page.title: 17ENGINEERING IN FORFAR
page.content: {Industry Reekie Engineering make and design {farm equipment}and repair tractors as well as farm implements etc. Ritchie make troughs,dipping baths, barrows,gates,feed bins,bale handlers general purpose drinkers & feeders. {Ladders}in wood and aluminium are made by Ramsay Ladders.They have quite a range:3-in-1,painters trestles,ladders with safety feet(rubber suction pads) and extension types.They also make staging for factories and airplane servicing.We have another 2 companies working in{iron and steel.}Ross & Bonnyman make hydraulic lifts & lorry tail gates: e.g.on our town's bus for the handicapped"The Forfarian".They have just won a contract with the DHSS to make wheelchairs.The Forfar Foundry melt iron in the furnace to make drain gratings & other castings.
